thread.title: Baker Mayfield will lead OU vs Texas in Dallas
thread.title_full: Baker Mayfield will lead OU vs Texas in Dallas

title: Baker Mayfield will lead OU vs Texas in Dallas
text:
Baker Mayfield will lead OU vs Texas in Dallas Baker Mayfield will lead OU vs Texas in Dallas Post to Facebook Baker Mayfield will lead OU vs Texas in Dallas Baker Mayfield will lead OU vs Texas in Dallas  //kvue.tv/1Lj4qux   Baker Mayfield will lead OU vs Texas in Dallas Shawn Clynch, KVUE 10:03 p.m. CDT October 7, 2015 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
When he was a child, Baker Mayfield was an Oklahoma Sooner fan. Mayfield was one of the great quarterbacks who carried on the legacy at Lake Travis High School. Mayfield to Experience 1st Red River Rivalry KVUE 
He ended up walking on at Texas Tech, earned Freshman Offensive Player of the Year in the Big 12, and played Texas in Austin. 
Mayfield wasn't offered a scholarship by Texas Tech and ended up transferring to OU and play for Bob Stoops. He sat out a season due to the transfer, but through 4-games as the Sooners starting quarterback Mayfield is producing 380 total yards of offense and is receiving mentions as Heisman Trophy candidate. 
Surprisingly, until last season Mayfield had never witnessed a Red River Rivalry in person. 
His first on the field, will be a dream come true as OU's starting quarterback Saturday morning at 11:00 AM. 
Click on the video icon for the complete story. Read or Share this story: http://kvue.tv/1Lj4qux TOP VIDEOS
